<CodeGroup>
```python Python
from notte_sdk import NotteClient

client = NotteClient()

with client.Session(open_viewer=True) as session:
    agent = client.Agent(session=session, max_steps=5)

    response = agent.run(
        task="Browse on Notte docs and book a demo for me",
        url="https://docs.notte.cc"
    )
    print(response)
```
